summinster.name: Summinster
summinster.description: The large city has a wall going around it that is oval shaped when seen from above. Near the entrances of each wall, are a few homes of locals who work the field or hunt or some other physical labour job. In the centre of the city is the high top district, a circular inner wall that makes the oval look similar to an eye. In the centre of this ring are 3 spires of equal height and width, these are the Animus Pillars - the royals, very high nobles and various mages live here, getting most of their supplies delivered, these royals rarely leave this areas of the city unless they have to.

saltcare.name: Saltcare
saltcare.description: A hardy coastal town famed for salt mining and resilient fisherfolk.

rustview.name: Rustview
rustview.description: An old mining city, its iron-rich red cliffs give the city its distinctive hue.

emberholst.name: Emberholst
emberholst.description: A city built on volcanic rock, renowned for its forgecraft and weaponry.

frostport.name: Frostport
frostport.description: Northern trade hub, ships pass through icy waters to bring goods across the realm.

ebonvale.name: Ebonvale
ebonvale.description: A shadowed valley city steeped in superstition and old magic.

fargate.name: Fargate
fargate.description: A frontier city guarding the passage between kingdoms, known for mercenary guilds.

nightside.name: Nightside
nightside.description: A city that rarely sees the sun, nestled against jagged cliffs under constant mist.

arrowborne.name: Arrowborne
arrowborne.description: A rugged settlement of hunters and rangers, famed for their longbows.
